column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I love the food here
column2: and always recommend to my friends this place. The low rating for today is from the 10 second service I received when picking up my to go order. When I entered
column3: I went to the host stand and said "I have a to go order" and the host pointed to it and said "go get it". It was the only order there
column4: so I picked it up. Out of no where
column5: another hostess snatched the order out of my hands and demanded to see confirmation. I understand she has a job to do
column6: but as someone from the industry
column7: I would NEVER forcefully grab anything from a guest's hands. Again
column8: I get you have a job to do
column9: and there's ways to do it
column10: but that was straight up rude.
